Reviews.Title: “Great place, highly recommended”

Reviews.Content: husband teenage son spent 11 marvelous days paris july floor quiet clean bathroom clean window facing quiet court staff polite helpful hotel walking distance attractions louvre notre dame musee d’orsay walked night tour eiffel neighborhood lively safe le bon marche corner bakery five minutes highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Recommend this Hotel”

Reviews.Content: wife recently stayed lindbergh hotel 4 nights found clean safe reasonably priced location staff professional friendly exceedingly helpful questions provided guidance regarding navigating paris trip paris time attempt lindbergh thanks sophie manuela late shift assistance stay highly recommend lindbergh hotel jim nancy baltimore md usa

Reviews.Title: “Live the local life with the easy access to tourist spots”
Reviews.Author: FauchonFan
Reviews.Content: situated restaurants lack english menus clues shops offer parisian delights stay hotel lindbergh cordial welcomed friendly staff spacious compared past european hotel experiences staff accomodating bilingual breakfast downstairs quaint meal american stereotypically european hot drinks fruit expect cold heads view outside apartments citizens expect gorgeous garden view city walk outside youll fantastic city street view hotel metro source transportation short walk street station youd convenience getting rer stations railway versailles restaurants hotel busy overthetop pricey restaurants strung popular cafès cafè lindbergh enjoy true parisian feel overall hotel value spacious worth showers water pressure walls paper thin fortunately tubs deep tourists polite understand quiet recommend hotel
